div.class: panel-pane pane-block pane-boxes-pausd-twitter pane-boxes right-align pausd-pane sidebar block-boxes-simple

div.p: Annual Niche rankings of K-12 School Districts
Average class size across all grades
Access to arts, music, and library instructional programs
Moody's and S&P General Obligation Bond Ratings

div.div: Thanks to a community that views education as one of its highest priorities, the District is the beneficiary of countless volunteer hours and financial support. PAUSD is especially appreciative of the work and support from the PTA Council, PTAs at each of the schools, and the Palo Alto Partners in Education. In addition to parent groups, the District fosters cooperative relationships and continues to build strategic partnerships with business and civic organizations.

img.alt: Palo Alto Partners in Education logo
